page.title: 06FOOD
page.content: Chips seem to be the most popular food .99% have a Sundays dinner. The majority of people don't eat health foods.The average amount of money spent a week on food is about Â£30. About 97% of people eat greasy foods. A lot of people like to stay in for their own cooking rather than go out.Most people-children eat a lot of cakes,biscuits and sweets.For breakfast most people preferred cereals or toast, for dinner most people have chips.For tea a lot of people have pie and chips and peas. Supper time most people have toast. Not many people are vegetarians.
